alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 14 at 1:13PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Nye County through 145 PM PDT... At 112 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 28 miles south of Blue Eagle Ranch, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall along with gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southern Nye County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
